Unitron:


The Alliance member sighed as the computer gave him orders.  "Stupid 
assignment..." he complained to himself.

Unitron picked up Vulois, putting him over his shoulder.  Walking over to the 
table, he set the unconscious robot down on the table, strapping his arms, 
legs, and neck.

Walking over to the computer near Vulois' head, he hooked up him up to the 
console.  Typing away quickly, he started the program 2345a, and took a few 
steps back, crossing his arms.
